verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In an interview on Fox News’ “ Fox & Friends] , ” [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: lashed] out [ARG1: against the Department of Justice] , [ARGM-ADV: slamming it for running a “ witch hunt ” and not “ doing their job] . ” He also bashed the FBI and accused the agency of collusion with the Democratic National Committee . He also said that he would not cooperate with the DOJ , although he added “ I may change my mind at some point . ” “ He is guilty of crimes , ” Trump ranted , speaking about former FBI Director James Comey , “ and if we had a Justice Department that was doing their job , instead of spending 10 million dollars trying to find – ” At this point , co - host Steve Doocy interrupted him . “ It ’s your Justice Department ! Mr. President , you ’re the Republican in charge , you ’ve got a Republican running it ! ” Doocy said . Trump responded : “ You ’re right , you ’re right . You ’re right ! I answer this all the time . Because of that fact that they have this witch hunt going …

He also said that he would not cooperate with the DOJ , although he added “ I may change my mind at some point . ” “ He is guilty of crimes , ” Trump ranted , speaking about former FBI Director James Comey , “ and if we had a Justice Department that was doing their job , instead of spending 10 million dollars trying to find – ” At this point , co - host Steve Doocy interrupted him . “ It ’s your Justice Department ! Mr. President , you ’re the Republican in charge , you ’ve got a Republican running it ! ” Doocy said . Trump responded : “ You ’re right , you ’re right . You ’re right ! I answer this all the time . Because of that fact that [ARG0: they] [V: have] [ARG1: this witch hunt going] …
